name: The Ritual (Unhlore)
description:
A game made made for the Houdini game jame by 1 person in 3 days, focused in the concept of carrot picking and defeating in order to progress in a peculiar quest, a ritual to produce the mother of carrot soups, all the assets were made with Houdini ( heightfield, towers, bushes, grass, carrots, etc), including icons, and the music was made with a synth piano and cleaned in Audacity.

Just unzqip and play, the houdini project used for the game jam is included with all the assets and hda's in case anyone would like to use them.

Move with WASD, use the mouse to look around, and 1,2,3 to do something far beyond human if you have acquired some elemental carrots.

Your objective is to obtain 7 medallions and the golden carrot , all scattered across a dense forest, fut beware, after all the residents of this region have removed everything but meat from their diet. (Currently there is no ending, so when you collect all the items you will be send to the main menu, an apology for that).
